segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see this family scene turning into potential tragedy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom is so absorbed in her routine, missing the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows quietly, pooling around her without a notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, but that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If the boy falls, it could hurt him badly on the slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits so expectantly, unaware of the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, but this theft feels like a small sadness in the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are open, water damaging the wood slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene, a stark contrast to the indoor woes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the mom; she'll be devastated by the mess later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron and dress will be ruined, adding to the sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This ordinary moment could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight highlights the innocence that's about to be shattered.
segments.speaker: PAR
